channel.title: Deep-Learning on Patrick Weygoldt
channel.description: Recent content in Deep-Learning on Patrick Weygoldt

item.title: Labeling pre-annotated images of a YOLO dataset with label-studio
item.description: Note: This guide was written using label-studio version 1.8.2.post1. With the modules included in pytorch, opencv or ultralytics, training computer vision models is easier than ever, the main constraint being the availability of labeled data.

item.title: My tech stack for data science with Python in 2023
item.description: A collection of libaries and tools that I use to analyze data with Python
